explains: v. 开除，解雇；不考虑，不理会；驳回，停止受理；让……离开，解散；（板球）使退场，使出局

sentences.en: He was so irresponsible that I decided to dismiss him.
sentences.cn: 他如此不负责任，我决定解雇他。

sentences.en: I think we can safely dismiss their objections.
sentences.cn: 我认为我们对他们的异议完全可以不予理会。

sentences.en: Officials dismiss these incidents as simple hooliganism.
sentences.cn: 官员们把这些事件看成是一般的流氓行为而草草了事。
